eventMonth.label: Event Month
eventMonth.tooltip: The event month as a number from 1-12

eventDay.label: Event Day
eventDay.tooltip: The day of the month your event is on

countdownMessage.label: Countdown Message
countdownMessage.tooltip: The message to display while counting down to the event. $days is the days until and $event is the Event Name setting

eventMessage.label: Event Message
eventMessage.tooltip: The message to display on the day of the event

commandName.label: Command Name
commandName.tooltip: Name of the command as it will be used in chat

cooldown.label: Command cooldown in seconds
cooldown.tooltip: How long users must wait before using the command

permission.label: Permission Level
permission.tooltip: Specify the user permission level required to use this command
